repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine 

MAINTAINER [Alejandro Baez](https://twitter.com/a_baez) 

ENV LUA_MAJOR_VERSION 5.1 
ENV LUA_MINOR_VERSION 5 
ENV LUA_VERSION ${LUA_MAJOR_VERSION}.${LUA_MINOR_VERSION} 

# Dependencies 
RUN apk add --no-cache --update make tar unzip gcc openssl-dev readline-dev curl libc-dev
RUN apk add --no-cache ncurses-dev

RUN curl -f -L https://www.lua.org/ftp/lua-${LUA_VERSION}.tar.gz | tar xzf -
WORKDIR /lua-$LUA_VERSION 

# build lua 
RUN make linux test 
RUN make install 

WORKDIR / 

# lua env 
ENV WITH_LUA /usr/local/ 
ENV LUA_LIB /usr/local/lib/lua 
ENV LUA_INCLUDE /usr/local/include 


RUN rm /lua-$LUA_VERSION -rf
